text: Nohomba mwaboola mbu; â€œEfwe khwishilibungwa eshitabu khwakhabeele abalunjifu muno okhubashila abo. Kho obwinoosi okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi bumalile okhuboolela, nende obulunjifu nende tsimbabaasi. Kho niwina omubi muno okhushila ulia uyingasia ebimanyisio bia- Nyasaye, mana niyera ehale ninabio? Khulibarunga balia beretsanga ehale nende ebimanyisio biefu eshinyasio eshilulu shichila okhwira ehale khwabu okho
